metadata.scenario: User reports a possible double charge

events.content: Hi, I think I was charged twice for my Pro subscription this month. I see two €29 payments from your company on my card. Can you check what happened?
I'm sorry for the worry — I'll check that for you now. Let me look up your recent invoices to see if there really are two charges or if one is an authorization hold.

Thanks for waiting — I checked your billing history.

There is **one completed charge** for €29 (your Pro subscription for this month), and a second €29 entry that is just an **authorization hold** from when your bank verified the card. It's not a real charge and will disappear in a few days.

Would you like me to email a copy of the paid invoice for your records?
That makes sense, thanks! Yes please, send me the invoice.
Sure — I'll email the invoice to the address on file.

Your invoice has been emailed and should arrive shortly. If you still see two settled charges after a few days, reply to that email and we’ll open a billing investigation.

Anything else I can help you with?
